title: WHO IS THE GOAT MILKING CHAMPION?

subtasks: Position yourself and Ethan to start milking the teats
Use dominant hand on one teat for milking
Control the speed of milking to avoid cramping
Celebrate the winner of the milking challenge
Check udder health of pregnant doe
Dispose of goat waste by mixing with compost
Maintain chicken coop and collect eggs
Feed chickens from prepared bouquets of leaves
Add goat waste to the compost pile
Prepare the garden for upcoming growth
Tease Ethan about not being able to do pull-ups
Compliment Ethan on pulling himself up (praise for Ethan's success)
Share flowers with Luna and deal with mischievousness (e.g., Dora)
Manage pets' behavior (e.g., Dora's drinking from duck water)
End chores with a encouraging farewell to family and pets
